Place0_Dialogue0_Alternative0.phrase: TM-8: Shut up, you’re drawing attention to us.

Place0_Dialogue0_Alternative1.phrase: TM-8: Yes, we make work hard.

Place0_Dialogue1_Alternative0.phrase: TM-8: It’s ok, just try and quiet down, i don’t want to get into trouble...

Place0_Dialogue1_Alternative1.phrase: TM-8: Why are you acting so weird?

Place0_Dialogue2_Alternative1.phrase: TM-8: You mean dreams...Do robots dream of electric sheep?

Place2_Dialogue1_Alternative0.phrase: TM-8: See you in robot heaven.

Place6_Dialogue0_Alternative0.phrase: TM-8: The guards chased me in here. What are you doing here?

Place6_Dialogue0_Alternative1.phrase: TM-8: I’m looking for a friend, and it led me in here, i’m sorry.

Place7_Dialogue0_Alternative0.phrase: Excuse me, I would like to pass through.

Place7_Dialogue0_Alternative1.phrase: Where are all these trucks going?

Place7_Dialogue1_Alternative0.phrase: I bE br0Kén R0bzot, mE can goEs pass through?

Place7_Dialogue1_Alternative1.phrase: Why won’t you let working robots exit?

Place10_Dialogue0_Alternative0.phrase: Umm... ok well i should probably leave you alone.

Place10_Dialogue0_Alternative1.phrase: It’s ok i’m not going to hurt you.

Place10_Dialogue1_Alternative1.phrase: No i promise i’m not going to do anything to you.

Place10_Dialogue2_Alternative1.phrase: What part of 'won’t hurt you' do you not understand!?

Place10_Dialogue3_Alternative0.phrase: I’m done with this i’m going.
